name: Shield of the Damned
effect:
:instant: Target [unit](../units/index.md) gains +3 :defense: and suffers 1 :damage:. It cannot be used on an enemy unit.

— OR —

:instant: Target [unit](../units/index.md) gains +5 :defense: and suffers 2 :damage:. It cannot be used on an enemy unit.
flavor_text: A Sprite is carrying a Shield as big as it is. Yuu ask, "Need help?" The Sprite glares at you and answers, "You think this is funny? Fine. You can carry it. I much prefer flying anyway."
